title: vEdapureesha sOdana
sahitya:
vEdapurIsha shOdana cEyaku vidulaku AdhAra vidyA svarUpuDavu

anupallavi

 nAda tarkamulu sAdhana gAdanu vAri brOcu sadguNa sampanna

caraNam

 aham brahmA tatvam antaryAmivi Atma kOTulaku jnAna prakAshuDavu 
iha paramulanu IDEra jEyavE sahaja guNa tyAgarAu nElavE
